resource: 1002063.description=Payload is the GVWR minus curb weight and includes weight of occupants, optional equipment and cargo, limited by weight distribution. Payload is not the Vehicle Capacity Weight as defined by FMVSS 110, which will vary according to installed optional equipment. Calculated with new SAE J2807 method. 1002063.vtc=true 1002063.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002063.derived=false
